title: Notwithstanding anything contained in this regulation, the relocation of the reservation from a land
clause_text: Notwithstanding anything contained in this regulation, the relocation of the reservation from a land may also be permitted on any land within 300 meters belonging to other owner‘s land if the said other owner consents (by way of registered deed) to such relocation of reservation on his land and consents to hand over his land to the Planning Authority where reservation is proposed to be relocated in lieu of TDR and also subject to restrictions mentioned in above sub Regulation
section: 3.11 RELOCATION OF D.P. / R.P. SITES / ROADS

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
